title: Samples, ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 21.5 cm [8.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 65 cm [25.5"]  Selvedge right side, cut other side.
b. Warp: 21 cm [8 1/4"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 33 cm [13"]  Cut both sides.
c. Warp: 21 cm [8 1/4"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 33 cm [13"]  Cut both sides.
d. Warp: 15 cm [6"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 32 cm [12.5"]  Selvedge right side, cut other side.
e. Warp: 12 cm [4 3/4"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 24 cm [9.5"]  Cut both sides.
creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott
description:
a. emerald green ground with gold and orange
b. pink ground with green and gold
c. green/yellow ground with two gold colors
d. bright green ground with green and gold
e. red ground with gold color and orange
